description: OpenAI/Codex function tool definitions for workflow phases. Additive integration; Claude plugin remains unchanged.

function.name: workflow_diagnose
function.description: Investigate a bug or unexpected behavior and produce root-cause triage guidance.

symptom.description: Observed issue and expected behavior mismatch.

context.description: Optional reproduction details, logs, or suspected area.

function.name: workflow_brainstorm
function.description: Turn a feature idea into a validated design document in docs/designs.

feature.description: Feature name or idea to design.

design_path.description: Optional explicit design document path under docs/designs/.

function.name: workflow_plan
function.description: Create an implementation plan from an approved design under docs/plans.

feature.description: Feature slug used to locate docs/designs/{feature}/design.md.

design_approved.description: Must be true after explicit design approval signal.

function.name: workflow_beads
function.description: Convert an approved plan into intent-based beads using br.

feature.description: Feature slug used to locate docs/plans/{feature}/overview.md.

plan_approved.description: Must be true after explicit plan approval signal.

priority.description: Optional default bead priority for created tasks.

function.name: workflow_execute
function.description: Execute approved beads and report implementation progress.

target.description: Epic id or feature name to execute.

beads_approved.description: Must be true after explicit beads approval signal.

function.name: workflow_review
function.description: Review implemented changes and summarize findings for approval.

scope.description: Optional feature name or file scope for review.

base_ref.description: Optional git base ref for diff, default: main.

function.name: workflow_compound
function.description: Capture a focused learning into docs/learnings after execute/review work.

category.description: Target learning category file name (without extension).

function.name: workflow_docs
function.description: OpenAI docs skill for docs/ operations. Supports find, summarize, and update under docs/ only.

action.description: Operation to run on docs/ content.

query.description: Substring to match for find (path or file text).

path.description: Relative path under docs/ for summarize or update.

content.description: Full file content used when action=update (overwrite).

max_results.description: Maximum number of matches returned for find.

max_file_bytes.description: Skip files larger than this during find content search.

max_summary_chars.description: Max characters for generated summary when action=summarize.

include_content.description: Include full file content alongside summary for action=summarize.
